special_powers.name: FIRST INTO THE FRAY
special_powers.description: If Captain America is the first character to make an attack on your turn, modify his attack value by +1.

special_powers.name: THE SKULL'S ARMY
special_powers.description: When a friendly character named Johann Schmidt or Red Skull is within 8 squares, HYDRA Soldier modifies his attack value +1.

special_powers.name: HAIL HYDRA!
special_powers.description: When a friendly character with the HYDRA keyword that's 40 points or more is within 8 squares, HYDRA Soldier modifies his range value +1.

special_powers.name: BATTLEFIELD PROMOTION
special_powers.description: If Agent of S.H.I.E.L.D. KO's or critical hits an opposing character, after actions resolve you may turn this dial to click #7.

special_powers.name: MINION: ORDERED TO COVER IT UP
special_powers.description: If a friendly character with the S.H.I.E.L.D. keyword and a higher point value is KO'd within 8 squares, after actions resolve you may place Agent of S.H.I.E.L.D. in the square the KO'd character occupied or an adjacent square.

special_powers.name: MIGHTY MJOLNIR
special_powers.description: When Thor makes a ranged combat attack, an opposing character he hits is knocked back equal to the damage taken (up to a maximum 3 squares) if not otherwise knocked back.

special_powers.name: LAUFEY'S ICY REALM
special_powers.description: When a friendly character named Laufey is within 8 squares, Frost Giant can use Poison.

special_powers.name: ARC REACTOR CHEST BEAM
special_powers.description: Give Iron Man a free action and make a ranged combat attack, modifying his attack value by -1. After this action resolves roll a d6. On a result [d:1]-[d:4]; deal Iron Man 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: TAKEDOWN
special_powers.description: When a character misses Black Widow with a close combat attack, after actions resolve give that character an action token.

special_powers.name: FOUND THE WEAK SPOT
special_powers.description: When making a ranged combat attack, if Hawkeye's attack roll is 10 or higher, he deals penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: SHIELD COORDINATOR
special_powers.description: Maria Hill can use Willpower.  Each friendly adjacent character with the S.H.I.E.L.D. keyword that's 50 points or less modifies its attack value by +1.

special_powers.name: SURPRISE LEAP ATTACK
special_powers.description: Sif can use Leap/Climb.  After she resolves a move action, if she's then adjacent to an opposing character that attacked a friendly character other than Sif since your last turn, you may give Sif a close combat action as a free action.

special_powers.name: CAUGHT ON THE RUN
special_powers.description: When an opposing character would make an attack targeting Bruce Banner, you may roll a d6. On a result of [d:6], you may replace Bruce Banner with a [set:avm] #014 Hulk on its orange starting line before the attack is made. Existing action tokens are applied to the replacement, and the attack now targets Hulk.

special_powers.name: ALTER EGO: HULK
special_powers.description: Give Bruce Banner a power action that deals no pushing damage and replace this character with [set:avm] #014 Hulk, or [set:avm] #202 Hulk on its orange starting line. Existing action tokens on this character and action tokens for this action are applied to the replacement. This power can't be countered.

special_powers.name: TWO FISTS OF DESTRUCTION
special_powers.description: Hulk can use Flurry.

special_powers.name: CONVINCE YOU TO DO SOMETHING RASH
special_powers.description: Loki can use Mind Control.  He isn't dealt unavoidable damage when using this Mind Control to target characters of 250 points or less.  When he uses it, if an opposing character takes damage from an attack during that action, you may heal Loki of 1 damage after actions resolve.

special_powers.name: BUILD ME A DOOMSDAY WEAPON
special_powers.description: Once per turn, you may give a power action to a friendly character with the Scientist keyword that is 25 points or more to put a Research counter on this card. When there are 7 or more Research counters on this card, Red Skull modifies his combat values by +2 and can use the Flight ability.

special_powers.name: DON'T FORGET ME, STEVE
special_powers.description: When Bucky Barnes is KO'd, you may choose a friendly character named Captain America.  For the rest of the game, modify that character's attack value by +1.

special_powers.name: BROOKLYN DUO
special_powers.description: When Bucky Barnes is adjacent to a friendly character named Captain America, modify both of their attack values by +1 if not already modified by this effect.

special_powers.name: THE GREAT ESCAPE
special_powers.description: When Captain America successfully breaks away, each friendly character may automatically break away this turn.

special_powers.name: BEHIND THE SHIELD
special_powers.description: Captain America can use Combat Reflexes and Toughness.  If he has no action tokens, he can use Energy Shield/Deflection.

special_powers.name: THE BIG THREE
special_powers.description: When making an attack roll, Captain America may roll 3 dice instead of 2 and then choose 1 die to ignore.

special_powers.name: BUILDING A BETTER IRON MAN
special_powers.description: Iron Man can use Super Strength. When he uses an object in an attack and hits, put an Armor token on this card. Iron Man modifies his defense value by +1 for each Armor token on this Card.

special_powers.name: THE BIG THREE
special_powers.description: When making an attack roll, Iron Man may roll 3 dice instead of 2 and choose 1 die to ignore.

special_powers.name: THE BIG THREE
special_powers.description: When making an attack roll, Thor may roll 3 dice instead of 2 and then choose 1 die to ignore.

special_powers.name: RAGE OF A WAYWARD SON
special_powers.description: When Thor begins the turn adjacent to an opposing character that's 75 points or more, at the beginning of your turn Thor makes a close combat attack as a free action if able and uses Battle Fury this turn.

special_powers.name: GENIUS INVENTOR
special_powers.description: Howard Stark can use Enhancement.

special_powers.name: RELENTLESS ENGINE OF DESTRUCTION
special_powers.description: Destroyer can't use the Carry ability.  At the beginning of your turn, Destroyer may be placed into an adjacent square.

special_powers.name: WARRIORS THREE TOGETHER
special_powers.description: Volstagg modifies his damage value by +1 if there are two or more other friendly characters with the Warriors Three keyword within 3 squares.

special_powers.name: WARRIORS THREE TOGETHER
special_powers.description: Hogun modifies his damage value by +1 if there are two or more other friendly characters with the Warriors Three keyword within 3 squares.

special_powers.name: WARRIORS THREE TOGETHER
special_powers.description: Fandral modifies his damage value by +1 if there are two or more other friendly characters with the Warriors Three keyword within 3 squares.

special_powers.name: WE'LL REMEMBER YOU, CAP
special_powers.description: If a friendly character named Captain America has been KO'd this game, modify Dum Dum Dugan's attack value by +1 for the rest of the game.

special_powers.name: SHOTGUN!
special_powers.description: When Dum Dum Dugan makes a ranged combat attack against a single target, his damage value is replaced with 5 minus the number of squares to the target character and is locked.

special_powers.name: WE'LL REMEMBER YOU, CAP
special_powers.description: If a friendly character named Captain America has been KO'd this game, modify Gabe Jones' attack value by +1 for the rest of the game.

special_powers.name: GRENADE!
special_powers.description: Give Gabe Jones a power action and choose a target square within 5 squares and line of fire (ignoring characters for line of fire purposes). Make a ranged combat attack targeting all characters occupying or adjacent to the target square. Deal 2 damage to each hit character.

special_powers.name: I'LL SAVE YOU, NO MATTER WHAT
special_powers.description: If a friendly character of a lower point value took damage since your last turn, Captain America can move using Leap/Climb as a free action.

special_powers.name: HOWLERS, LET'S GO!
special_powers.description: Captain America can use Leadership. When he succeeds on his Leadership roll, he may remove up to 2 action tokens instead of 1 if both tokens are removed from adjacent friendly character(s) with the Howling Commandos keyword.

special_powers.name: TRUST ME, I'LL HELP YOU SNEAK IN
special_powers.description: Once per game, give Loki a double power action and choose an opposing character within 6 squares. Place that character in a square that's adjacent to Loki but also adjacent to no other characters and then Loki makes a close combat attack targeting that character.

special_powers.name: CASKET OF ANCIENT WINTERS
special_powers.description: When Laufey is KO'd, give each opposing character an action token.

special_powers.name: I UPHOLD THE TRUCE
special_powers.description: When Laufey attacks an opposing character that attacked a friendly character since your last turn, modify Laufey's attack value by +1.

special_powers.name: KING OF THE FROST GIANTS
special_powers.description: Laufey can use Perplex. He can use it normally, or he can modify a combat value except damage by +2 if he targets a character with both the Asgardian and Monster keywords.

special_powers.name: "RUN HOME, LITTLE PRINCESS"
special_powers.description: Give Frost Giant Champion a free action if he has no action tokens and choose a character within 6 squares and line of fire. That character possesses Battle Fury until your next turn.

special_powers.name: INVASION FORCE
special_powers.description: Skrull General can use Phasing/Teleport and the Carry ability. He can carry two characters if both have the Skrulls keyword.

special_powers.name: ELECTRIC TOUCH
special_powers.description: Skrull Warrior can use Flurry. His second attack using Flurry deals penetrating damage if his first attack hit.

special_powers.name: I'M HERE TO TALK ABOUT THE AVENGERS INITIATIVE
special_powers.description: Friendly characters possessing [ta:shield] who begin an action adjacent to Nick Fury can use [ta:avengers_initiative] for that action.

special_powers.name: UNSUBTLE INFILTRATION
special_powers.description: Black Widow can use Leap/Climb.

special_powers.name: MINION: TARGET ACQUIRED
special_powers.description: If a friendly character with the S.H.I.E.L.D. keyword that's 50 points or more is within 8 squares, S.H.I.E.L.D. Enforcer can use the Sharpshooter ability.

special_powers.name: ALTER EGO: RED SKULL
special_powers.description: Give Johann Schmidt a power action that deals no pushing damage and replace this character with [set:avm] #016 Red Skull on its orange starting line. Existing action tokens on this character and action tokens for this action are applied to the replacement. This power can't be countered.

special_powers.name: MY OWN PRIVATE ARMY
special_powers.description: Adjacent friendly characters possessing [ta:hydra] can also use [ta:shield].

special_powers.name: MINION: CUBE POWERED RIFLES
special_powers.description: If a friendly character named Johann Schmidt or Red Skull is within 8 squares, Hydra Footsoldier can use Penetrating/Psychic Blast.

special_powers.name: MINION: CUBE POWERED TECH
special_powers.description: If a friendly character named Johann Schmidt or Red Skull is within 8 squares, Hydra Technician can use Perplex.

special_powers.name: DIRECT CONTROL OF THE CUBE
special_powers.description: Red Skull can use Perplex and Probability Control.

special_powers.name: ODIN SLEEP
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, heal Odin of damage equal to 2 minus the number of his action tokens.

special_powers.name: THE MIGHTY AVENGER
special_powers.description: Adjacent friendly characters with the Avengers keyword modify their attack values by +1 if not already modified by this effect.

special_powers.name: CALL FORTH THE STORM
special_powers.description: Thor can use Energy Explosion. When he does, Thor deals 1 additional damage to the targets of his attack.

special_powers.name: FURY EMBODIED
special_powers.description: Hulk can use Charge. He can use it normally, or he can be given a double power action to use Charge but does not halve his speed value if he doesn't use the Carry ability or pick up or hold an object.

special_powers.name: I AM S.H.I.E.L.D. AND YOU ALL WORK FOR ME
special_powers.description: Adjacent friendly characters possessing [ta:avengers_initiative] can also use [ta:shield].

special_powers.name: YOU BETTER SAVE ME, I'M THE BOSS
special_powers.description: Nick Fury can use either Toughness or Invulnerability if an adjacent friendly character that he shares a keyword with can use that power.

special_powers.name: THE FIRST AVENGER
special_powers.description: Adjacent friendly characters with the Avengers keyword modify their defense values by +1 if not already modified by this effect.

special_powers.name: SUPER SOLDIER
special_powers.description: Captain America can use Super Strength, but can't pick up or hold heavy objects.

special_powers.name: THE ARMORED AVENGER
special_powers.description: Adjacent friendly characters with the Avengers keyword modify their range values by +1 if not already modified by this effect.

special_powers.name: I NEED ALL OF THIS CONFISCATED, NOW
special_powers.description: Give Agent Coulson a power action. You may place adjacent to him up to two other friendly characters with the S.H.I.E.L.D. keyword that are 50 points or less and within 8 squares. Those characters can't be given an action later this turn.

special_powers.name: I'M NOT INTIMIDATED BY ANY "SUPER" HEROES
special_powers.description: Characters 100 points or more can't target Agent Coulson with an attack unless Agent Coulson is the only character on your force.

special_powers.name: BODY DOUBLE
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, you may choose an opposing character with a range value of 4 or more. If you do, only that character can target Skrull Infiltrator with ranged combat attacks.

special_powers.name: PUT AWAY THE BOW
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, you may give Hawkeye a free action. If you do, Hawkeye possesses Combat Reflexes instead of Energy Shield/Deflection and Close Combat Expert instead of Ranged Combat Expert until your next turn.

special_powers.name: CALL THE SHOT, FURY
special_powers.description: Hawkeye ignores friendly characters with action tokens for line of fire purposes.

special_powers.name: ALTER EGO: I AM IRON MAN
special_powers.description: Give Tony Stark a power action that deals no pushing damage and replace this character with [set:avm] #006 or [set:avm] #205 Iron Man on its orange starting line. Existing action tokens on this character and action tokens for this action are applied to the replacement. This power can't be countered.

special_powers.name: IT'S MINE - YOU CAN'T HAVE IT
special_powers.description: Tony Stark modifies the defense value of adjacent friendly characters with the Armor or Robot keyword by +1. Tony Stark modifies the attack value of opposing characters with the Armor or Robot keyword by -1.

special_powers.name: THE ALL-SEEING
special_powers.description: Opposing characters modify their attack value by -3 when attacking Heimdall if they do not occupy the square in which they began their turn.

special_powers.name: THE ALL-KNOWING
special_powers.description: Heimdall can use Super Senses.

special_powers.name: HE STRIKES FROM WITHIN
special_powers.description: Loki can use Toughness, and all copyable Team Abilities that opposing characters can use.

special_powers.name: SOUL SHRED
special_powers.description: Loki can use Mind Control. When he uses it and hits, after actions resolve give the character a Corruption token. Characters with Corruption tokens modify their defense value by -1 for each Corruption token.
